name: Mac & Cheese
description: Creamy cheddar cheese blends flawlessly with tender macaroni, finished with a crispy breadcrumb topping for the perfect crunch. A timeless comfort classic that warms the soul with every bite.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce in Caesar dressing, finished with crunchy croutons and Parmesan shavings.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Al dente spaghetti coated in a creamy sauce of egg yolk, pecorino, pancetta, and pepper. Rich and indulgent!

name: Veggie Burger
description: A juicy veggie patty on a whole-grain bun, layered with fresh lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Tender grilled chicken breast with creamy avocado, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and honey mustard on a toasted bun.

name: Steak Frites
description: A perfectly cooked steak, prepared to your liking, accompanied by crispy golden fries and a dollop of rich herb butter.

name: Sushi Roll Platter
description: A variety of fresh sushi rolls, featuring California, Spicy Tuna, and Eel Avocado.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Succulent chicken pieces cooked in a flavorful and fragrant curry sauce, paired with fluffy basmati rice.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: A wholesome bowl of quinoa, roasted vegetables, creamy avocado, and drizzled with tahini dressing.

name: Seafood Paella
description: A traditional Spanish dish featuring saffron-infused rice, shrimp, mussels, and chorizo.

name: Pancake Stack
description: Soft, fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and crowned with fresh berries.

name: Miso Ramen
description: A comforting bowl of ramen in savory miso broth, topped with tender pork, a soft-boiled egg, and fresh green onions.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Three soft tortillas stuffed with seasoned beef, fresh salsa, cheese, and a dollop of sour cream.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Lobster Bisque
description: A creamy soup made from lobster stock, aromatic vegetables, and a touch of brandy.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms and finished with parmesan.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.

name: Lemon Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafels tucked into a warm pita, accompanied by lettuce, tomatoes, and a drizzle of tahini sauce.
